mapper.insert: insert into market_order_status_logger(order_sequence_number, mark, notify_type, local_status, remote_status, local_complete_time, remote_complete_time) values(#{orderSequenceNumber}, #{mark}, #{notifyType}, #{localStatus}, #{remoteStatus}, #{localCompleteTime}, #{remoteCompleteTime})
mapper.select: select * from market_order_status_logger where order_sequence_number = #{orderSequenceNumber} and notify_type = #{notifyType} and local_status = #{localStatus}
mapper.update: update market_order_status_logger set remote_status = #{remoteStatus}, remote_complete_time = #{remoteCompleteTime} where order_sequence_number = #{orderSequenceNumber} and notify_type = #{notifyType} and local_status = #{localStatus}
